# system.query_condition_cache

<SystemTableCloud/>

쿼리 조건 캐시의 내용을 보여줍니다 [query condition cache](../query-condition-cache.md).

컬럼:

<!--AUTOGENERATED_START-->
- `table_uuid` ([UUID](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 테이블 UUID.
- `part_name` ([String](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 파트 이름.
- `condition` ([String](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 해시된 필터 조건. 설정 query_condition_cache_store_conditions_as_plaintext = true일 때만 설정됩니다.
- `condition_hash` ([UInt64](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 필터 조건의 해시.
- `entry_size` ([UInt64](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 항목의 크기 (바이트 단위).
- `matching_marks` ([String](../../sql-reference/data-types/)) — 일치하는 마크.
<!--AUTOGENERATED_END-->

**예제**

```sql
SELECT * FROM system.query_condition_cache FORMAT Vertical;
```

```text
Row 1:
──────
table_uuid:     28270a24-ea27-49f6-99cd-97b9bee976ac
part_name:      all_1_1_0
condition:      or(equals(b, 10000_UInt16), equals(c, 10000_UInt16))
condition_hash: 5456494897146899690 -- 5.46 quintillion
entry_size:     40
matching_marks: 111111110000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000111111110000000000000000

1 row in set. Elapsed: 0.004 sec.
```
